{
  "harvardmetadata" : {
    "mappings" : {
      "_meta" : {
        "created_by" : "file-data-visualizer"
      },
      "properties" : {
        "@id" : {
          "type" : "text"
        },
        "@timestamp" : {
          "type" : "date"
        },
        "description" : {
          "type" : "text"
        },
        "field" : {
          "type" : "keyword"
        },
        "identifier" : {
          "type" : "text"
        },
        "message" : {
          "type" : "text"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
